casebody.data:
Whitney J. DEROCHE, Jr.
v.
Roy A. BLANCHARD, Farm Bureau Insurance Company and Teche Airboats, Inc. No. 2019-CC-0064 Supreme Court of Louisiana. March 6, 2019 ON WRIT OF CERTIORARI TO THE COURT OF APPEAL, FIRST CIRCUIT, PARISH OF LAFOURCHE Writ denied. HUGHES, J., would grant.

CRICHTON, J., would grant and assigns reasons.

CRICHTON, J., would grant and assigns reasons:

For the reasons assigned by Judges Guidry and Holdridge, I would grant the defendant's writ application, reverse the court of appeal, and remand the matter for a full trial on the merits.
